parameters.name: SourceOptionGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the source option group. Constraints: Must specify a valid option group.

parameters.name: TargetOptionGroupIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier for the copied option group. Constraints: Can't be null, empty, or blank Must contain from 1 to 255 letters, numbers, or hyphens First character must be a letter Can't end with a hyphen or contain two consecutive hyphens Example: my-option-group.

parameters.name: TargetOptionGroupDescription
parameters.description: The description for the copied option group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: A list of tags. For more information, see Tagging Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon RDS User Guide or Tagging Amazon Aurora and Amazon RDS resources in the Amazon Aurora User Guide. (dict) --- Metadata assigned to an Amazon RDS resource consisting of a key-value pair. Key (string) --- A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$'). Value (string) --- A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: A key is the required name of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 128 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: A value is the optional value of the tag. The string value can be from 1 to 256 Unicode characters in length and can't be prefixed with aws: or rds:. The string can only contain only the set of Unicode letters, digits, white-space, --_', --.', --:', --/', --=', --+', ---', --@' (Java regex: '^([\p{L}\p{Z}\p{N}_.:/=+\-@]*)$').

nested_items.name: OptionGroupName
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the option group.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupDescription
nested_items.description: Provides a description of the option group.

nested_items.name: EngineName
nested_items.description: Indicates the name of the engine that this option group can be applied to.

nested_items.name: MajorEngineVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the major engine version associated with this option group.

nested_items.name: Options
nested_items.description: Indicates what options are available in the option group.

nested_items.name: OptionName
nested_items.description: The name of the option.

nested_items.name: OptionDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the option.

nested_items.name: Persistent
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this option is persistent.

nested_items.name: Permanent
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this option is permanent.

nested_items.name: Port
nested_items.description: If required, the port configured for this option to use.

nested_items.name: OptionVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the option.

nested_items.name: OptionSettings
nested_items.description: The option settings for this option.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the option that has settings that you can set.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The current value of the option setting.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value of the option setting.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the option setting.

nested_items.name: ApplyType
nested_items.description: The DB engine specific parameter type.

nested_items.name: DataType
nested_items.description: The data type of the option setting.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: The allowed values of the option setting.

nested_items.name: IsModifiable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the option setting can be modified from the default.

nested_items.name: IsCollection
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the option setting is part of a collection.

nested_items.name: DBSecurityGroupMemberships
nested_items.description: If the option requires access to a port, then this DB security group allows access to the port.
ModifyDBInstance.
RebootDBInstance.
RestoreDBInstanceFromDBSnapshot.
RestoreDBInstanceToPointInTime.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroupMemberships
nested_items.description: If the option requires access to a port, then this VPC security group allows access to the port.

nested_items.name: VpcSecurityGroupId
nested_items.description: The name of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The membership status of the VPC security group.

nested_items.name: AllowsVpcAndNonVpcInstanceMemberships
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this option group can be applied to both VPC and non-VPC instances. The value true indicates the option group can be applied to both VPC and non-VPC instances.

nested_items.name: VpcId
nested_items.description: If AllowsVpcAndNonVpcInstanceMemberships is false, this field is blank. If AllowsVpcAndNonVpcInstanceMemberships is true and this field is blank, then this option group can be applied to both VPC and non-VPC instances. If this field contains a value, then this option group can only be applied to instances that are in the VPC indicated by this field.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the option group.

nested_items.name: SourceOptionGroup
nested_items.description: Specifies the name of the option group from which this option group is copied.

nested_items.name: SourceAccountId
nested_items.description: Specifies the Amazon Web Services account ID for the option group from which this option group is copied.

nested_items.name: CopyTimestamp
nested_items.description: Indicates when the option group was copied.
